name: Ratz Instagib
description: Shoot first, eat cheese later! Jump into a fast, frenetic and exciting one-hit, one-kill FPS arena shooter with a totally level playing field, tonnes of maps, customisation and a robust map editor!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i3 Processor, 2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Integrated Graphics (256MB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Mouse/Keyboard required; turn off anti-aliasing/outlines to maximise framerate
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Processor, 2.8GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or similar dedicated graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Mouse/Keyboard required

reviews.review_text: That game can make the time you spend playing it fun and pretty interesting. The game has a fine graphic and cool gameplay, the soundtrack is good. This was a unique experience playing that game and I liked it a lot.
This game is pure fun. Fluid movement and no gimmicks.
Best Game perfect 5/7
Do it for the badge

played on a map called 'don't fear the pingas' for a solid hour. never before have i played such a revolutionary game
This game is hella fun BUT, beware of the low player count.
Does anyone still play this game?
I loved this game it has nobody playing it so i was playing with myself just like i aways do 9/11

OFFICIAL RELEASE? Wow, they grow up so fast.  This game has the speed and gameplay of a classic arena shooter and it feels good. An amazing hit-detection system, customizable characters, fun maps. I don't know what else I can really say but this game is really good. You might have a hard time finding matches, but that was just me.   Anyways, this is definatly worth a purchase. Have fun!
bhopping and shooting. what more can you want
It's insta kill, stylised graphics, exagerated cpma style movement with cool dnb tunes. If those are your requirements, you'll love it, it does it very well.
This game is good.
top game of the game
incredibly fun and satisfying. even if you're only playing with bots
Extremely good game but very small player base. At the time I'm writing this, the US server has 5 players.
Really fun game, Wish there was more player though:)
This game is great
this is a prime example on how little arena shooters require to be great

super fun & super fast ... thats all, just buy it, its 2â‚¬
It is a great game.It demands pure aiming skill and good reaction time.However,it lacks players and community.

Too bad no one is playing this game anymore and that the community is dying, I really like its concept, and I think the developer needs to get more recognition for this. Lots of customization options, lots. And the game is really fun, especially in a full match; might not be everyone's cup of tea though, and clearly not mine but this didn't prevent me from having fun running around, jumping, boosting, trying to get a shot in. In short, point, dodge, shoot and hope(...) it hits...or know it hits depending on your skill level. In shorter, super fun. Clear lack of a tutorial, but very easy to get the hang of.  [+] : Specifications, Customization, Fun [-] : Dying Community [Note] : Only deathmatch have people on anymore.  Perfect game for an 'on-the-go' gaming (a stable connection is highly recommended) who can't put CS:GO or Team Fortress-type games on their laptop (due to lack of storage?), though this isn't a clone of that at all. Plus it's low specs, low space.  P.S. I already knew that the game community was nearly dead when I bought this, I just thought this game deserved to be known, and it looks like what sells get marked as a success and what doesn't is labelled as a failure, which is really sad as this is really fun. It's sad to note that the 'failure' of this game is entirely based on people having other (maybe better - according to them, at least) things to play...
